docs.snippet: This week, a new food is appearing on Passover tables around the country. The Orthodox Union, the authority on kosher foods, recently ruled that certain brands of quinoa could carry its “Kosher for Passover” symbol....
docs.abstract: This week, a new food is appearing on Passover tables around the country. The Orthodox Union, the authority on kosher foods, recently ruled that certain brands of quinoa could carry its “Kosher for Passover” symbol.

headline.print_headline: Court Overturns 1 SEC Conflict Minerals Provision
headline.main: Court Overturns 1 SEC Conflict Minerals Provision

docs.snippet: A federal appeals court has overturned a disclosure requirement that public companies must post information about their use of minerals from Congo, where militias linked to atrocities have profited from mining minerals used in electronics, jewelry...
docs.lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court has overturned a disclosure requirement that public companies must post information about their use of minerals from Congo, where militias linked to atrocities have profited from mining minerals used in electronics, jewelry and other goods.

headline.print_headline: Israel Irked by Diplomat's Tacit Nazi Remark
headline.main: Israel Irked by Diplomat's Tacit Nazi Remark

docs.lead_paragraph: Two former executives of a defunct New York broker-dealer were indicted Monday as part of a widening U.S. investigation into foreign bribery involving their employer and Venezuelan state economic development banks.

headline.print_headline: Monte Paschi May Need to Raise Up to 5 Billion Euros in Cap Hike: ANSA
headline.main: Monte Paschi May Need to Raise Up to 5 Billion Euros in Cap Hike: ANSA

docs.snippet: Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena may need to raise up to 5 billion euros ($6.9 billion) through an upcoming capital hike, rather than the 3 billion euros originally planned, Italian news agency ANSA reported on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena may need to raise up to 5 billion euros ($6.9 billion) through an upcoming capital hike, rather than the 3 billion euros originally planned, Italian news agency ANSA reported on Monday.

headline.print_headline: ‘The Flick’ Is to Return To Off Broadway
headline.main: Pulitzer-Winning Play 'The Flick' to Reopen in New York

docs.snippet: Annie Baker’s play won the Pulitzer Prize for drama on Monday, and will open at Barrow Street Theater in the near future....
docs.abstract: Annie Baker’s play won the Pulitzer Prize for drama on Monday, and will open at Barrow Street Theater in the near future.

headline.print_headline: Trend Persists of Prisons as Mental Health Housing
headline.main: Trend Persists of Prisons as Mental Health Housing

docs.snippet: A federal judge's objection to what he called the horrific treatment of some mentally ill inmates in California prisons highlights a trend that has been building for decades in the state and across the country: As mental hospitals closed or were s...
docs.lead_paragraph: A federal judge's objection to what he called the horrific treatment of some mentally ill inmates in California prisons highlights a trend that has been building for decades in the state and across the country: As mental hospitals closed or were scaled back, prisons and county jails have become the de facto housing for many who are mentally ill.
